summary: A former thief unbeknownst to a dead body in his car drives to a bright future- but the men who planted the body now need it back.
cast: Michael Madsen|Patricia Arquette|Sal Jenco|Darren Epton|Gregory Sporleder|Paul Ben-Victor|Billy Bob Thornton|Rustam Branaman|Florence Stanley|Seymour Cassel|Patrick Cupo|Monty Hoffman|Billy Bastiani|Vincent Guastaferro|Deryl Hayes|Mark Pellegrino|Carl Ciarfalio|Everett Greenbaum|Bill Cook|Mary Kircher|Ginger Lynn|Paul Thomas
